reqs:
Pre-reqs: PHYS 402.
Please note that the times for a few graduate courses may change between publication of this schedule and the start of classes in September. Please check the Graduate Student bulletin board outside the Main Office for any updates.
description: Non-relativistic quantum mechanics with applications to atomic, nuclear and particle physics. Perturbation theory, multielectron atoms, molecular structure, WKB, scattering theory.
